title: Melvin server in restaurant Selye stress syndrome

content.question: Melvin, a server at a restaurant, is in the middle of a lunch rush. He is completing orders, serving customers, and seating new guests. He has adapted to this level of stress and is coping. Which of the following terms identifies a stage in the general adaptation syndrome that Melvin is currently experiencing?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
